title: 280 MB daily
info: 280 MB Internet for 1 day for 30 Afghanis. Send D200 to 555 to activate and UD200 to deactivate.

title: 1 GB daily
info: 1 GB Internet for 1 day for 50 Afghanis. To activate D1 and to deactivate send UD1 to 555.

title: 3 GB daily
info: 3 GB Internet for 1 day at the price of 90 Afghanis. To activate 3GB and to deactivate, send U3GB to 555.
